metadata.title: CVE-2023-27789 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - negligible
metadata.description:
An issue found in TCPprep v.4.4.3 allows a remote attacker to cause adenial of service via the cidr2cidr function at the cidr.c:178 endpoint.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-27789` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpreplay - 4.3.2-1ubuntu0.1~esm3
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: tcpreplay package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.3.2-1ubuntu0.1~esm3').
